title: Autumn Awakening (and Garden Graveyard!): Preparing for Cool-Season Planting

tasks.task: Tidy up plants and prepare beds for winter.
subtasks: Trim apple mint and get rid of dead parts.
Check strawberry plants and trim dead growth.
Remove eggplant and prepare soil for carrots.
Plant carrot seeds in the eggplant bed.
Plan different crops for unused beds (beetroot, pepper tree, garlic chives).
Plant beetroot seeds in prepared pots.
Transplant pepper tree seedling into pot.
Add mulch and support for pepper tree.
Plant basil in beds for aroma and attracting bees.
Care for mushroom setup in grow house.
Monitor strawberry plants for survival over winter.
Plan and prepare beds for spring crops.

tasks.task: Tidy up plants and prepare beds for winter.
Taking care of mushroom setup in grow house.
1. Tidying and planting in the main garden (MAINTASK).
Tidy up plants and prepare beds for winter.
subtasks: Trim apple mint and get rid of dead parts.
Check strawberry plants and trim dead growth.
Remove eggplant and prepare the bed for carrots.
Plant carrot seeds in the eggplant bed.
Plan and prepare a bed for beetroot and transplant the pepper tree.
Plant basil in various pots and beds.

tasks.task: Take care of mushroom setup in the grow house (irrelevant, as it's not a physical task related to farming/agriculture).
Prepare garden for autumn/winter (likely a subtask under general tidying, but separate since mentioned).
